name: Mobile Switcher
author: Timur Khamitov

sections.description:
The plugin allows you to set different themes for display on mobile devices.
With this plugin you can select a theme that will be displayed if a user visits your site with a Tablet PC, mobile phone or desktop.

Readme Generator

This Readme file was generated using wp-readme, which generates readme files for WordPress Plugins.
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Q: What types of devices determines the plugin?

A: Plug-in determine the following types of devices

  • Tablet PC
  • Mobile phones & smartphones
  • Desktop PC
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

Plugin release. Operate all the basic functions.
